pullRequest.title: Remove several Painless user tree nodes
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR contains the following clean up:

Remove the EConstant node from the user tree. This is no longer necessary as we don't do constant folding as part of the semantic phase anymore.
Remove DType nodes from the user tree. These are no longer necessary as they were part of a plan to add flexibility to Painless under a single tree architecture.
Remove SDeclaration from SCatch. Catch statements are unique enough that using and SDeclaration node for the variable declaration was an overly complex indirection.
Rename ScriptRoot to ScriptScope and rename Scope to SemanticScope. ScriptRoot is just the scope for the overall compilation of the script. With multiple phases is makes sense to rename Scope to SemanticScope as this will only be used during the semantic phase and may overlap otherwise.
Make ScriptScope a child of SemanticScope so that we can have only one argument passed in during phases as this will eventually be refactored into a generic base visitor.

nodes.bodyText: Let's chat about this.  Is it due to SDeclaration removal?
Why is type lookup so late?

commit.message: add tests for not a statement
move isDefOptimized to output instead of as mutable state on the nodes

remove AStoreable and give individual nodes responsibility to check
write
clean up write messages and add tests
elimate extraneous new array function reference ir node
switch ir function ref nodes to different types
remove ILambda in favor of ir tree calculating def method call recipe
remove sub nodes from user tree
remove PainlessCast from output as it's completely local
removed ambiguity in parsing related to casting versus binary
handle negation in the user tree instead of relying on the walker
add guards for invalid static values
add partial types tests and not a symbol tests
add tests for valid static types
add precedence node to handle final lexer hack removal path
move prefix into nodes its actually used in
Use block instead of list of statements for Lambda
add primitive types to remove binary recognition of cast
remove remaining node instantiations within the semantic pass
partial first pass of cleaning up members of user tree nodes
setup user nodes for external pass by making members private w/ getters
name changes Scope to SemanticScope, ScriptRoot to ScriptScope
remove DType nodes and remove SDeclaration from SCatch
remove unnecessary test code from Walker
